entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
